name: The Journey: Bob's Story
description: The Journey: Bob's Story is an Exploration, Atmospheric and puzzle 2D platformer. Play as Bob, who goes on an adventure to find his best friend Neibag who left the village with a group of explorers through villages secret cave.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 540GT Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX series Storage: 4 GB available space
